name: PlagueENd
description:
Use the information you have to figure out who has the plague and who doesn't. Pay attention to the looks of the characters, but be careful, because looks can be deceiving! 

This game was made by Charlotte Marriner, Samuel Marsh and Luca Hawes at East Norfolk Sixth Form College on a Level 4 Games course. This game was also made and used for the Time and Tide museum to use in their temporary Medieval Medicine exhibit.
